column4: hi all i am trying to hide the keyboard icon since i have created shortcut keys can someone assist ?
i have trid gcon.editor>gnome setting"> keyboard disable
if its on the tool bar , just rightl click on it and say quit
what DE are you using - most have a way of enabling panel options / disabling of apps inside the panel
i tried that and there isn't a quit option just my layouts, show keymap, and show keyboard options
yes, am seeing that - just a sec will tell you how
and there is not an option to not show the icon under options
it is 12.04 if that matters for any reason
no which Desktop environment - Cinnamon, mate, kde xfce etx, yes it matters because each have a diffeent way of managing the panel
Go to cinnamon settings there you will find the option to turn keyboard off
